text: Nice little theme with the classic SNES sound right there. This game only came in North America and I actually thought it was a better version of Cybernator, also on the SNES. Quite challenging though, I never did beat it back then. I like how they added "sold by Konami" as if the logo was not enough.
author: SupraDarky

text: I like how this game clearly uses the same soundfont as Zombies Ate My Neighbors, also from Lucasarts. It's more obvious in the title screen music.
author: JP Martins

text: A game that was very advanced for its time. No other game had that ability to exit and enter the robot in full battle o_0
author: NajibSG

text: Nice bass drum kick. Reminds me of how another SNES mech game Vortex has some good techno bass synth.
author: SchlossRitter

text: This sure takes me back; I always had the hardest time deciding between Havoc and Nitro whenever I played it with friends. Thanks for posting it!
author: Ish

text: Man I feel old knowing this title.
author: Philip J. Fry II

text: Back when konami made good games....

Oh hey, I put this one in my VGM List as well. I was wondering when you might discover this one.
